page.title: 11ROYAL MARINE MARCHING BAND.
page.content: {Fort Brockhurst}was built in the 19th. century. Since that time the {Army}and the{Royal Marines}have used it.There are six cannons altogether - two on the battlements,two used in the Gun Run and two on the grass.In the last war,World War Two, the casements or rooms on the north flank were destroyed. Today the Fort has a museum.This shows the history of the Fort.All the secret passages are blocked off except for the one in the keep.The Fort is still used today.It is used by the{Royal {Marines Light Infantry Cadet Marching {Band. My name is Kevin Lillington and I am a cadet at Fort Brockhurst.I am in the band.We go every Monday and Thursday for two hours - from 6.30 to 8.30.The band and drums are invited to do displays.
